sections.title: Leveling Up
sections.description: After you survive a Fight and @Rest, you can level up by testing one of your stats OR gain 1 additional @Insight
sections.mechanics: Roll 1d10 against 1 chosen stat (@Body, @Agility, @Focus, or @Fate). If the roll is lower than your current stat value, increase that stat by 1.
sections.limits: Maximum stat value is 9. If all your stats are at 9.

sections.title: Insight
sections.description: All hunters start with 1 Insight. You can reroll any tests a number of times equal to your Insight quantity per day. Insight resets after a @NightsRest.
sections.perception: Insight allows you to see hidden creatures, lights, and objects that others cannot perceive. Higher Insight reveals more about the cosmos and threats to mankind.
